function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Customers eating outside or in their cars","Impact":"Increased risk of viral transmission in outdoor dining areas","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures and outdoor dining regulations","Technologies":"Outdoor seating arrangements, contactless payment systems","People":"Customers, restaurant staff, general public","Owner":"Restaurant owners, local government"},{"Description":"DJ playing music while serving food and drinks","Impact":"Gathering of people increases risk of viral transmission","Mitigation":"Limit the number of people at the event, enforce social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Event management software for capacity control, contact tracing applications","People":"DJ, event organizers, attendees","Owner":"Event organizers, restaurant owners, local government"},{"Description":"Enabling improvised practices in the servicescape","Impact":"Potential for unregulated behaviors that increase viral transmission","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines for customer behavior, enforce social distancing measures","Technologies":"Signage for guidelines, contactless payment systems","People":"Customers, restaurant staff, general public","Owner":"Restaurant owners, local government"}]}
